All Layers
Animatable Properties

Layer properties that can be animated using Core Animation. More...

Padding

CGFloat CPTLayer::paddingLeft
 Amount to inset the left side of each sublayer.

 Amount to inset the top of each sublayer.

 Amount to inset the right side of each sublayer.
CGFloat CPTLayer::paddingBottom
 Amount to inset the bottom of each sublayer.

Detailed Description

Layer properties that can be animated using Core Animation.

Since:
Custom layer property animation is supported on MacOS 10.6 and later.
